医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
由于系统偏差，有色人种和白人女性在临床试验中的代表性不足随机对照试验（RCT）被认为是临床研究中研究新疗法的安全性和有效性的最佳方法。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240702/People-of-color-and-white-women-underrepresented-in-clinical-trials-due-to-systematic-biases.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240702/People-of-color-and-white-women-underrepresented-in-clinical-trials-due-to-systematic-biases.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0cfb97af-b377-457a-ade9-2523ff7738dc Tue, 02 Jul 2024 21:01:10 -0400 People of color and white women underrepresented in clinical trials due to systematic biases
研究通过肠道微生物组变化将植物蛋白与青春期延迟联系起来中国的一项大型研究发现，高植物蛋白摄入量与青春期推迟和儿童有益的肠道微生物组变化有关，而高动物蛋白摄入量则与青春期提前相关。肠道微生物组介导这些影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240702/Study-links-vegetable- Protein-to-delayed-puberty-through-gut-microbiome-changes.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240702/Study-links-vegetable- Protein-to-delayed-puberty-through-gut-microbiome-changes.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=60dccd87-df45-4e0a-8b93-2d60a0375eb7 Tue, 02 Jul 2024 21:00:00 -0400 Study links vegetable protein to delayed puberty through gut microbiome changes
研究发现美洲印第安人/阿拉斯加原住民女性乳房再造率较低美国官方医学杂志《整形与重建外科》7 月号上的一篇论文报道，与非西班牙裔白人女性相比，患有乳腺癌的美国印第安人/阿拉斯加原住民 (AI/AN) 女性在乳房切除术后乳房重建率始终较低美国整形外科医生协会 (ASPS)。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240702/Study-finds-lower-rates-of-breast-reconstruction-among-American-IndianAlaska-Native-women.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240702/Study-finds-lower-rates-of-breast-reconstruction-among-American-IndianAlaska-Native-women.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=126935a3-29f5-49de-a604-b75358d1384b Tue, 02 Jul 2024 20:56:29 -0400 Study finds lower rates of breast reconstruction among American Indian/Alaska Native women
FDA商业巴氏灭菌工艺可杀死牛奶中的H5N1禽流感病毒FDA 和 USDA 的一项研究证实，商业牛奶巴氏灭菌可有效灭活牛奶中的高致病性 H5N1 禽流感病毒。这确保了美国牛奶供应的安全，免受这种病毒的侵害。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240702/FDA-commercial-pasteurization-process-kills-H5N1-bird-flu-virus-in-milk.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240702/FDA-commercial-pasteurization-process-kills-H5N1-bird-flu-virus-in-milk.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=42b025e0-4d1e-49fa-b795-272e07b1edf8 Tue, 02 Jul 2024 20:48:00 -0400 FDA commercial pasteurization process kills H5N1 bird flu virus in milk
TRPC5基因被确定为肥胖和产后抑郁症的诊断标志物贝勒医学院、剑桥大学和合作机构的研究人员发现，人类基因 TRPC5 的改变会导致肥胖和产后抑郁症。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240702/TRPC5-gene-identified-as-a-diagnostic-marker-of-obesity-and-postpartum-depression.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240702/TRPC5-gene-identified-as-a-diagnostic-marker-of-obesity-and-postpartum-depression.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7d3b5b5a-c8f9-43bf-b613-7d33e38eb290 Tue, 02 Jul 2024 20:33:01 -0400 TRPC5 gene identified as a diagnostic marker of obesity and postpartum depression
韦尔奇基金会资助 UTA 创造有效药物输送新材料的研究韦尔奇基金会拨款 30 万美元，支持德克萨斯大学阿灵顿分校的研究，开发新材料，以安全有效地输送药物来治疗癌症等疾病。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240702/Welch-Foundation-funds-UTAe28099s-research-into-creating-new-materials-for- effective-drug-delivery.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240702/Welch-Foundation-funds-UTAe28099s-research-into-creating-new-materials-for- effective-drug-delivery.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f199b6da-2ffb-4f0f-b78e-c176d3fd13db Tue, 02 Jul 2024 20:26:37 -0400 Welch Foundation funds UTA’s research into creating new materials for effective drug delivery
研究表明精制碳水化合物会增加炎症和心血管风险《营养》杂志上的一项研究发现，碳水化合物的数量和质量都会影响炎症和心血管疾病 (CVD) 风险。较高的精制碳水化合物摄入量与更严重的炎症和心血管疾病有关，这强调了个性化饮食建议的必要性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240702/Study-reveals-refined-carbs-heighten-inflammation-and-cardioangio-risk.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240702/Study-reveals-refined-carbs-heighten-inflammation-and-cardioangio-risk.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e063a5cd-1ff0-4534-b5b0-5c7275ef497d Tue, 02 Jul 2024 20:17:00 -0400 Study reveals refined carbs heighten inflammation and cardiovascular risk
久坐的生活方式和屏幕时间与中国年轻人代谢综合征的增加有关一项新的研究表明，久坐行为和增加屏幕时间对中国儿童和青少年代谢综合征（MetS）的患病率有显着影响，受影响率为 5.5%。城市生活、年龄较大和久坐时间较长会增加代谢综合征的风险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240702/Sedentary-lifestyle-and-screen-time-linked-to-rising-metabolic-syndrome-in-Chinese-youth.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240702/Sedentary-lifestyle-and-screen-time-linked-to-rising-metabolic-syndrome-in-Chinese-youth.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d3b84246-73c5-46e2-83a3-19fbc6f10b59 Tue, 02 Jul 2024 20:03:00 -0400 Sedentary lifestyle and screen time linked to rising metabolic syndrome in Chinese youth
所呈现的结果表明，主要吃最低限度加工的食品并不利于健康饮食一项新的研究表明，主要食用 NOVA 分类系统所定义的最低限度加工食品并不会自动形成健康饮食，这表明我们所吃的食物类型可能比用于制作它们的加工水平更重要。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240702/Presented-results-suggest-eating-primarily-minimally-processed-foods-does-not-make-for-a-healthy-diet.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240702/Presented-results-suggest-eating-primarily-minimally-processed-foods-does-not-make-for-a-healthy-diet.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1fd415cf-2efb-481c-bbe7-be26136fa572 Tue, 02 Jul 2024 18:17:00 -0400 Presented results suggest eating primarily minimally processed foods does not make for a healthy diet
摄入更多大豆异黄酮的儿童表现出更好的思维能力和注意力一项新研究发现，从大豆食品中摄入更多异黄酮的学龄儿童表现出更好的思维能力和注意力。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240702/Children-consuming-more-isoflavones-from-soy-foods-exhibit-better-thinking-bility-and-attention.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240702/Children-consuming-more-isoflavones-from-soy-foods-exhibit-better-thinking-bility-and-attention.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d150c951-06a5-4ef7-ac25-eb5cce5d41e2 Tue, 02 Jul 2024 12:58:27 -0400 Children consuming more isoflavones from soy foods exhibit better thinking abilities and attention
